entity.name: scanjob
entity.query: SELECT sj.id jobid, sj.status jobstatus, sj.modified modified, sjl.name reviser, sjl.id reviserid, e.id entryid, e.modified scannablemodified, ja.signature jsignature, ja.journaltitle jtitle, ja.pageStart articlepagestart, ja.pageEnd articlepageend, bc.signature bsignature, bc.booktitle btitle, bc.pageStart chapterpagestart, bc.pageEnd chapterpageend, rc.id collectionid, rc.rcnumberid collectionnumber, rcl.name locationname, rcl.id locationid FROM scan_job sj LEFT JOIN scan_job_book_chapter sjbc on sj.id = sjbc.scanjobid LEFT JOIN scan_job_journal_article sjja on sj.id = sjja.scanjobid LEFT JOIN journal_article ja ON ja.id = sjja.journalarticleid LEFT JOIN book_chapter bc ON bc.id = sjbc.bookchapterid LEFT JOIN entry e ON ja.id = e.id or bc.id = e.id LEFT JOIN reserve_collection rc ON rc.id = e.reservecollectionid LEFT JOIN library_location rcl ON rc.librarylocationid = rcl.id LEFT JOIN library_location sjl ON sj.locationid = sjl.id WHERE e.deleted IS NULL
